- Add step-by-step guide for finding Player and AnimatedSprite2D nodes
- Add new card on front page linking to tutorial

fix: Add type assertions for cookie icing property assignments

- Add type assertion when assigning currentColor to cookie.icing
- Add type assertion when assigning validated color values to cookie.icing
- Resolves TypeScript build errors where string type was not assignable to color literal union type

Fixes GitHub Actions build failure.
